description: Generate a link for a friend that leads to a gently insulting animation of entering a prompt, and then redirects to ChatGPT itself.

name: Stealthly for macOS
tagline: Automated privacy for macOS screen sharing
description: Keep your screen private and distraction-free when you present or record your screen on macOS — automatically. Stealthly automatically enables Do Not Disturb as well as hides desktop icons, active app windows, the dock, your wallpaper and menu bar icons.

name: In My Pocket
tagline: Your secure personal vault for everything that matters
description: An iOS app that securely stores and organizes all your personal information. - Flexible organization with tabs and sections - Secure sensitive data with biometric authentication - Built-in Markdown support, QR code generation, and OCR text recognition

name: Hunyuan-T1
tagline: The first Mamba-powered ultra-large model
description: The latest breakthrough in AI reasoning! Powered by Hunyuan TurboS, it's built for speed, accuracy, and efficiency.

name: Roblox Cube 3D
tagline: AI-powered 3D object creation
description: Generate 3D objects from text prompts, directly within Roblox Studio. Powered by Roblox's core generative AI system.

name: Audio Guide It
tagline: Explore any place on earth with immersive AI audioguides.
description: Audio Guide It is your interactive AI travel guide—anywhere in the world. Instantly get detailed stories and context about history, art, and architecture for any attraction on the planet. Have questions? Simply ask your guide and get immediate answers.

name: varyance.io
tagline: Inspire early talent for their future career.
description: Take-on virtual experiences designed by investment banks, big law,consulting firms and industry leaders to explore your future career.

name: CalScri
tagline: Create & plan content calendars & scripts with anayltics!
description: Calscri simplifies content creation with content calendars, advanced script generation & analytics. Create scripts in the style of top creators like MrBeast, Alex Hormozi & more. Plan content in minutes & track social media performance.

name: Faceless Ninja AI
tagline: Create AI Faceless Videos for Tiktok, YT Shorts & IG Reels
description: Describe your video concept and get unique AI Faceless videos daily, ready to post! Beautiful AI visuals and emotional voiceovers! Post to TikTok, Shorts & Reels on autopilot - go viral while staying anonymous.

name: FormGenie
tagline: AI Agent To Build Google / Airtable Forms, Analyze Results
description: FormGenie lets you create and edit forms effortlessly using natural language. Just describe what you need, and it builds it for you. You can also chat with your database of responses to analyze results in plain language, gaining AI-powered insights instantly.

name: CSS & JavaScript Minifier Tool
tagline: Reduce file size without affecting functionality.
description: Free online CSS and JavaScript minifier tool. Reduce file size up to 70%, improve website performance, support bulk minification. Advanced options for JavaScript with variable mangling and dead code removal.

name: Make your landing
tagline: Build high-converting landing pages in minutes!
description: 🚀 Create stunning, high-converting, and fully responsive landing pages in minutes! 1. Pick from sleek sections 2. Style them your way 3. Export clean, ready-to-use code. Build, customize, and launch effortlessly. 🎨✨

tagline: The World's Top Experts. On Demand.

name: BillOptim
tagline: Smart billing & metering solutions for modern businesses
description: Transform your billing operations with BillOptim. Automated billing, usage-based pricing, and smart metering solutions for SaaS companies. Streamline your revenue operations today.

name: Ali: AI Business Consultant for UAE
tagline: Your 24/7 AI assistant to launching a UAE business.
description: Ali is your AI Business Consultant, available 24/7 to help you set up and manage your UAE business. Ask about visas, bank accounts, or regulations—Ali provides instant, personalized advice and generates proposals. Powered by Instacorp’s all-in-one platform.

tagline: Autobiography of Vinayak Singh Oberoi
description: In "Eighteen," Vinayak Singh Oberoi extends an open invitation to traverse the intricate landscape of his formative years, offering readers an immersive journey through the corridors of his past. al, spiritual, and family influences.

name: Bindago
tagline: Automate Linkedin Sales Outreach without breaking the bank
description: Bindago provides powerful automation tools for LinkedIn Sales Navigator. With Bindago, you can automate bulk connections requests, send mass InMails, and create Campaigns with message sequences without losing out on personalisation. Try the free trial today!

tagline: Your force field against distractions
description: Prod is your digital force field—a sleek Chrome extension that blocks distracting sites and clutter so you can focus on what matters. Reclaim your time and boost productivity with our customizable, minimalist interface.
